languages.text: "Ненависть душит змеей, а страх жгучим ядом разливается по телу, ибо избранный Путь ведет меня лишь тропами неудачи. Я не могу ни сдержать свое горе, ни обуздать свой гнев... Но и свернуть с Пути я также не в силах". {n}Ирлиэт сдавленно всхлипывает, бросает горестный взгляд, и лицо ее вновь становится неумолимым.{/n} "Прости мой скоротечный гнев, элантах. Когда ускользает воля, душа трепещет от необузданных эмоций. Но я приму смирение сердца, ибо лишь так клейменный Изгой может помочь собратьям, потерявшимся во тьме".

traits.locale_text: "Ненависть душит змеей, а страх жгучим ядом разливается по телу, ибо избранный Путь ведет меня лишь тропами неудачи. Я не могу ни сдержать свое горе, ни обуздать свой гнев... Но и свернуть с Пути я также не в силах". {n}Ирлиэт сдавленно всхлипывает, бросает горестный взгляд, и лицо ее вновь становится неумолимым.{/n} "Прости мой скоротечный гнев, элантах. Когда ускользает воля, душа трепещет от необузданных эмоций. Но я приму смирение сердца, ибо лишь так клейменный Изгой может помочь собратьям, потерявшимся во тьме".

languages.text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor rein in my anger... And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."
languages.original_text: "Ненависть душит змеей, а страх жгучим ядом разливается по телу, ибо избранный Путь ведет меня лишь тропами неудачи. Я не могу ни сдержать свое горе, ни обуздать свой гнев... Но и свернуть с Пути я также не в силах". {n}Ирлиэт сдавленно всхлипывает, бросает горестный взгляд, и лицо ее вновь становится неумолимым.{/n} "Прости мой скоротечный гнев, элантах. Когда ускользает воля, душа трепещет от необузданных эмоций. Но я приму смирение сердца, ибо лишь так клейменный Изгой может помочь собратьям, потерявшимся во тьме".

traits.locale_text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor reign in my anger... And yet am powerless to stray away from it." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and gives you a distressed look before her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Forgive my fleeting wrath, elantach. When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. But I will accept the meekness of the heart, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. languages.text: “仇恨像蛇一样勒紧了我的脖子，恐惧像沸腾的毒药一样在我身体里流淌，因为我选择的道途却将我引向了失败的道路。我无法抑制我的悲痛，也无法克制我的愤怒……然而，我却无力离开我的道途。”{n}伊莉耶特克制住了短暂的哭泣，向你投来悲痛的一瞥，之后她的脸再次变得冷硬起来。{/n}“请不必理会我转瞬即逝的愤怒，外界人。当意志软弱无力时，灵魂就会因暴烈的情绪而颤抖不已。但我依然要让我的心重归平和，因为除此之外，被标记的流浪者没有别的方法能帮助那些在黑暗之中徘徊的艾达灵族同胞。”
languages.original_text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor rein in my anger... And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

languages.text: «El odio me estrangula como una serpiente y el miedo atraviesa mi cuerpo como un veneno ardiente, pues la Senda que he elegido me lleva por los caminos del fracaso. No puedo ni contener mi pena ni controlar mi ira... y, aun así, soy incapaz de desviarme de mi Senda». {n}Yrliet ahoga un breve sollozo y te lanza una mirada cargada de dolor, pero después su expresión se vuelve implacable una vez más.{/n} «Ignora mi furia pasajera, elantach. Cuando la voluntad flaquea, el alma se estremece bajo un torrente de emociones. Pero resignaré mi corazón a la docilidad, pues una proscrita marcada no puede ayudar de otra forma a los Aeldari que vagan por la oscuridad».
languages.original_text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor rein in my anger... And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

No puedo ni contener mi pena ni controlar mi ira... y, aun así, soy incapaz de desviarme de mi Senda». {n}Yrliet ahoga un breve sollozo y te lanza una mirada cargada de dolor, pero después su expresión se vuelve implacable una vez más.{/n} «Ignora mi furia pasajera, elantach. Cuando la voluntad flaquea, el alma se estremece bajo un torrente de emociones. Pero resignaré mi corazón a la docilidad, pues una proscrita marcada no puede ayudar de otra forma a los Aeldari que vagan por la oscuridad».

languages.text: 「憎しみは蛇のように私の首を絞め、恐怖は燃え盛る毒のように私の体を駆け巡る。私が選んだ道は、私を失敗の道へと導いてゆく。悲しみを抑えることも、怒りを抑えることもできない。それでも、私は自分の道から外れることができないのだ」{n}ユリエットは短い嗚咽をこらえ、悲しみに打ちひしがれた視線をあなたに投げかける。{/n}「私のはかない怒りに耳を貸すな、エランタ。意志が抜け落ちたとき、魂は激しい感情に震える。しかし、私は心を柔和に委ねよう。闇の中を彷徨っている仲間のアエルダリを助けるには、印のついた追放者が他にできることはないのだから」
languages.original_text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor rein in my anger... And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

languages.text: "Der Hass erstickt mich wie eine Schlange, und die Furcht fließt durch meinen Körper wie ein brennendes Gift, denn der Pfad, den ich erwählt habe, führt mich auf die Straßen des Scheiterns. Ich kann weder meine Trauer zurückhalten noch meinen Zorn zügeln ... Und doch bin ich machtlos, von meinem Pfad zu weichen." {n}Yrliet unterdrückt ein kurzes Schluchzen und blickt dich mit von Trauer erfüllten Augen an, dann wird ihre Miene wieder unerbittlich.{/n} "Beachtet meinen flüchtigen Zorn gar nicht weiter, Elantach. Wenn der Wille entgleitet, erzittert die Seele vor ungezügelten Emotionen. Doch ich werde mein Herz zum Sanftmut nötigen, denn anders kann ein markierter Ausgestoßener anderen Aeldari nicht helfen, die durch die Dunkelheit wandern."
languages.original_text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor rein in my anger... And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

languages.text: « La haine m'étouffe comme un serpent, et la peur se répand dans mon corps comme un poison brûlant, car la Voie que j'ai choisie ne cesse de me conduire à l'échec. Je ne peux ni contenir mon chagrin ni endiguer ma colère... et pourtant, je n'ai pas la force de dévier de ma Voie. » {n}Yrliet réprime un bref sanglot et vous lance un regard affligé, puis son visage reprend son expression implacable.{/n} « Ne prêtez pas attention à ma fureur passagère, elantach. Lorsque la volonté s'échappe, les émotions déchaînées font trembler l'âme. Mais je vais résigner mon cœur à la docilité, car c'est la seule manière pour une Errante marquée d'aider les autres Aeldaris qui errent dans les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor rein in my anger... And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

Lorsque la volonté s'échappe, les émotions déchaînées font trembler l'âme. Mais je vais résigner mon cœur à la docilité, car c'est la seule manière pour une Errante marquée d'aider les autres Aeldaris qui errent dans les ténèbres. »

languages.text: "Öfke, âdeta bir yılan gibi boynuma dolandı. Korkuysa alev alev yanan bir zehir gibi damarlarımda akıyor. Çünkü seçtiğim Yol, beni başarısızlıklara açılan patikalara sürüklüyor. Ne kederimi zapt edebiliyor ne de öfkemi dizginleyebiliyorum. Ancak yine de Yolumdan sapamayacak denli güçsüzüm." {n}Yrliet, hafif bir hıçkırığı bastırarak sana keder dolu bir bakış atıyor. Ardından yüzünü yeniden amansız bir ifade kaplıyor.{/n} "Gelip geçici kinime aldırış etme elantach. İradenin kontrolünü kaybettiğinde ruhun, hiddetli duygularla çalkalanır. Ancak yüreğimi mütevazılığa teslim edeceğim. Çünkü işaretlenmiş bir Yurtsuzun, karanlıkta kaybolmuş bir Aeldari dostuna yardım etmesinin başka yolu yoktur."
languages.original_text: "Hatred is strangling me like a snake and fear is coursing through my body like a burning poison, for the Path I chose is leading me down the roads of failure. I can neither hold back my grief nor rein in my anger... And yet I am powerless to stray from my Path." {n}Yrliet stifles a brief sob and casts a grief-stricken glance at you, and then her face turns implacable once again.{/n} "Pay no heed to my fleeting wrath, elantach. When the will slips away, the soul trembles with rampant emotions. But I will resign my heart to meekness, for there is no other way a marked Outcast can help their fellow Aeldari wandering in the dark."

traits.locale_text: "Öfke, âdeta bir yılan gibi boynuma dolandı. Korkuysa alev alev yanan bir zehir gibi damarlarımdan akıp gidiyor. Çünkü seçtiğim Yol, beni başarısızlıklara açılan patikalara sürüklüyor. Ne kederimi zaptedebiliyorum ne de öfkemi dizginleyebiliyorum. Ancak yine de Yolumdan sapamayacak denli güçsüzüm." {n}Yrliet, hafif bir hıçkırığı bastırarak sana keder dolu bir bakış atıyor. Ardından yüzünü yeniden amansız bir ifade kaplıyor.{/n} "Gelip geçici kinime aldırış etme elantach. İradenin kontrolünü kaybettiğinde ruhun hiddetli duygularla çalkalanır. Ancak yüreğimi mütevazılığa teslim edeceğim. Çünkü işaretlenmiş bir Yurtsuzun karanlıkta kaybolmuş bir Aeldari arkadaşına yardım etmesinin başka yolu yok."
